title: David Simas
added: | office1 = [[Register of Deeds]] of the Northern District of [[Bristol County, Massachusetts|Bristol County]]

title: David Simas
deleted: After leaving the city council he served as an assistant register of deeds for the Northern district office of the [[Bristol County, Massachusetts|Bristol County]] Registry of Deeds.<ref>[https://web.archive.org/web/20031001211155/http://www.tauntondeeds.com/ BRISTOL COUNTY REGISTRY OF DEEDS NORTHERN DISTRICT Website (archived October 1, 2003)]</ref> He was later elected as the new Register of Deeds of the Northern district of Bristol County in 2004.<ref name ="ES">[https://electionstats.state.ma.us/candidates/view/David-M-Simas David M. Simas (D)]</ref> He won reelection in 2006 but later resigned to accept a position in Governor Deval Patrick's administration.<ref name ="ES" />
